20 class ModelTraining : public cloudUtilities<pcl::PointXYZI>
21 {
22  protected:
23  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr _cloud;
24  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr _ground;
25  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr _model;
26  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr blob;
27  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr blob_removed;
28  bool save_point_cloud;
29  ros::NodeHandle _nh;
30  ros::Subscriber _sub;
31  ros::Subscriber _sub_save;
32  ros::Publisher _pub;
33  tf2_ros::StaticTransformBroadcaster _staticTrans;
34  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped _cameraPose;
35  std::string _working_dir;
36 
37  public:
38  ModelTraining(ros::NodeHandle nh, std::string work_dir): _nh(nh),
39  save_point_cloud(false),
40  cloudUtilities<pcl::PointXYZI>()
41  {
42  _sub = _nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("/nimbus/pointcloud", 10 , boost::bind(&ModelTraining::Callback, this, _1));
43  _pub = _nh.advertise<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>>("filtered_cloud", 5);
44  _sub_save = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Bool>("save_pointcloud", 10, boost::bind(&ModelTraining::saveCallback, this, _1));
45  _cameraPose.child_frame_id = "detector";
46  _cameraPose.header.frame_id = "world";
47  _cameraPose.transform.translation.x = 0;
48  _cameraPose.transform.translation.y = 0;
49  _cameraPose.transform.translation.z = 1;
50  tf2::Quaternion q;
51  q.setRPY(-1.57, 1.57, 0);
52  _cameraPose.transform.rotation.x = q.x();
53  _cameraPose.transform.rotation.y = q.y();
54  _cameraPose.transform.rotation.z = q.z();
55  _cameraPose.transform.rotation.w = q.w();
56  }
57 
58  void Callback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr &msg)
59  {
60  blob.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
61  blob_removed.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
62  pcl::PCLPointCloud2 pcl_pc2;
63  pcl_conversions::toPCL(*msg, pcl_pc2);
64  pcl::fromPCLPointCloud2(pcl_pc2, *blob);
65  this->outlineRemover(blob, blob->width, blob->height, 0.67, 0.67, *blob_removed);
66  blob_removed->is_dense = false;
67  this->_queue.enqueue(*blob_removed);
68  }
69 
70  void saveCallback(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr &msg)
71  {
72  save_point_cloud = msg->data;
73  }
74 
75  void run()
76  {
77  std::string model_name = "/box_";
78  std::string extention = ".pcd";
79  std::string saved_groudtruth;
80  int counter = 0;
81  std::stringstream dir;
82  _working_dir = boost::filesystem::current_path().c_str();
83  dir << _working_dir << "/ros_ws/test";
84  boost::filesystem::path test_dir = dir.str();
85  if(!boost::filesystem::exists(test_dir) && !boost::filesystem::is_directory(test_dir))
86  boost::filesystem::create_directory(test_dir);
87  while(ros::ok())
88  {
89  unsigned int queue_size = this->_queue.size();
90  if(queue_size > 20)
91  {
92  _cloud.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
93  _ground.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
94  _model.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
95  this->meanFilter(*_cloud);
96 
97  ROS_INFO("Ready to save");
98 
99  if(save_point_cloud){
100  save_point_cloud = false;
101  std::stringstream ss;
102  ss << test_dir.c_str() << model_name;
103  if (counter == 0){
104  ss << std::to_string(counter) << extention;
105  saved_groudtruth = ss.str();
106  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII(ss.str(), *_cloud);
107  ROS_WARN("Saved PCD file path: %s", saved_groudtruth.c_str());
108  counter += 1;
109  }else{
110  ss << std::to_string(counter) << extention;
111  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(saved_groudtruth, *_ground);
112  this->modelFromGroudtruth(_ground, _cloud, 0.03, *_model);
113  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII(ss.str(), *_model);
114  std::string saved_model_path = ss.str();
115  ROS_WARN("Saved PCD file path: %s", saved_model_path.c_str());
116  counter += 1;
117  }
118  }
119 
120  _cloud->header.frame_id = "detector";
121  pcl_conversions::toPCL(ros::Time::now(), _cloud->header.stamp);
122  _pub.publish(_cloud);
123 
124  if(queue_size > 100){
125  while(!this->_queue.isEmpty()){
126  this->_queue.dequeue(*_cloud);
127  }
128  }
129  }
130  _staticTrans.sendTransform(_cameraPose);
131  ros::spinOnce();
132  }
133  }
134 };
135 
136 int main(int argc, char** argv)
137 {
138  ros::init(argc, argv, "nimbus_model_training_node");
139  ros::NodeHandle nh;
140 
141  ModelTraining training(nh, argv[0]);
142 
143  try{
144  training.run();
145  }catch(ros::Exception e){
146  ROS_ERROR("Runtime error %s", e.what());
147  }
148  return 0;
149 }
